summary: OCC1UPANT RESTRAINT CONTROLLER RECALL.  S61/NHTSA 16V-668  I HAVE BEEN TRYING FOR OVER THREE WEEKS TO GET THIS REPAIRED.  MY LOCAL DEALERSHIP STATES IT HAS TO BE ORDERED.  I CALLED TODAY AGAIN 10/23 AND WAS TOLD ANOTHER TWO MORE WEEKS.  THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. DEALER IN QUESTION IS CROWN DODGE IN VENTURA, CA.
